00033     template <unsigned D, typename N = double> class Vector {
00034 
00035         public:
00036 
00037         //----------  management  ----------
00039 
00040         Vector<D, N> () { }
00042 
00044         Vector<D, N> (N x0, ... );
00045 
00046         //----------  access      ----------
00047 
00049 
00051         N &operator[] (unsigned i);
00053 
00055         N operator[] (unsigned i) const;
00056 
00058         static unsigned dimension (void);
00059 
00060         //----------  arithmetics ----------
00061 
00064         Vector<D, N> &operator+= (const Vector<D, N> &Y);
00067         Vector<D, N> &operator-= (const Vector<D, N> &Y);
00070         Vector<D, N> &operator*= (const N &s);
00071 
00073         Vector<D, N> operator- (void) const;
00076         Vector<D, N> operator+ (const Vector<D, N> &Y) const;
00079         Vector<D, N> operator- (const Vector<D, N> &Y) const;
00082         Vector<D, N> operator* (const N &s) const;
00084 
00086         N operator* (const Vector<D, N> &X) const;
00089         Vector<D, N> operator/ (const N &s) const;
00091

00094 
00096         N sqnorm (void) const;
00097 
00099         bool operator==(const Vector<D, N> &other) const {
00100             for (unsigned i = 0; i < D; i++) {
00101                 if (x[i] != other[i]) return false;
00102             }
00103             return true;
00104         }
00105 
00107 
00109         bool operator<(const Vector<D, N> &other) const {
00110             if (sqnorm() == other.sqnorm()) {
00111                 for (unsigned i = 0; i < D; i++) {
00112                     if (x[i] < other[i]) return true;
00113                     if (x[i] > other[i]) return false;
00114                 }
00115             }
00116             return sqnorm() < other.sqnorm();
00117         }
00118 
00120 
00121         N *data () { return x; }
00122 
00123     private:
00124         N x[D]; 
00125     };

00134     template <unsigned D, typename N>
00135             Vector<D, N>::Vector (N x0, ... ) :
00136             x () {
00137         x[0] = x0;
00138         unsigned i = 0;
00139         va_list argp;
00140         va_start (argp, x0);
00141         for (i = 1; i < D; i++) {
00142             x[i] = va_arg (argp, N);
00143         }
00144         va_end (argp);
00145     }

00149     template <unsigned D, typename N>
00150             N &Vector<D, N>::operator[] (unsigned i) {
00151         assert(i < D);
00152         return x[i];
00153     }

00155     template <unsigned D, typename N>
00156             N Vector<D, N>::operator[] (unsigned i) const {
00157         assert(i < D);
00158         return x[i];

00163         return D;

00168     template <unsigned D, typename N>
00169             Vector<D, N> &Vector<D, N>::operator+= (const Vector<D, N> &Y) {
00170         for (unsigned i = 0; i < D; i++) x[i] += Y.x[i];
00171         return *this;
00172     }
00173 
00174     template <unsigned D, typename N>
00175             Vector<D, N> &Vector<D, N>::operator-= (const Vector<D, N> &Y) {
00176         for (unsigned i = 0; i < D; i++) x[i] -= Y.x[i];
00177         return *this;
00178     }

00180     template <unsigned D, typename N>
00181             Vector<D, N> &Vector<D, N>::operator*= (const N &s) {
00182     for (unsigned i = 0; i < D; i++) x[i] *= s;
00183     return *this;
00184     }

00186     template <unsigned D, typename N>
00187             Vector<D, N> Vector<D, N>::operator- (void) const {
00188         static Vector<D, N> Z;
00189         Z = *this;
00190         for (unsigned i = 0; i < D; i++) Z.x[i] = -x[i] ;
00191         return Z;
00192     }
00193 
00194     template <unsigned D, typename N>
00195             Vector<D, N> Vector<D, N>::operator+ (const Vector<D, N> &Y) const {
00196     static Vector<D, N> Z;
00197     Z = *this;
00198     return (Z += Y);
00199     }

00201     template <unsigned D, typename N>
00202             Vector<D, N> Vector<D, N>::operator- (const Vector<D, N> &Y) const {
00203     static Vector<D, N> Z;
00204     Z = *this;
00205     return (Z -= Y);
00206     }

00208     template <unsigned D, typename N>
00209             Vector<D, N> Vector<D, N>::operator* (const N &s) const {
00210     Vector <D, N>Z;
00211     Z = *this;
00212     return Z *= s;
00213     }
00214 
00215     template <unsigned D, typename N>
00216             N Vector<D, N>::operator* (const Vector<D, N> &Y) const {
00217     N dot = 0.;
00218     for (unsigned i = 0; i < D; i++)
00219         if (x[i]) dot += x[i]*Y.x[i];
00220 
00221     return dot;
00222     }
00223 
00224     template <unsigned D, typename N>
00225             Vector<D, N> Vector<D, N>::operator/ (const N &s) const {
00226     return operator* (1./s);
00227     }
00228 
00229     template <unsigned D, typename N>
00230             Vector<D, N> Vector<D, N>::operator/ (const Vector<D, N> &X) const {
00231         Vector<D, N> tmp;
00232         for (unsigned i = 0; i < D; i++)
00233             tmp[i] = x[i]/X[i];
00234         return tmp;
00235     }

00238     template <unsigned D, typename N>
00239             N Vector<D, N>::sqnorm (void) const {
00240     return operator* (*this);
00241     }

00251     template <unsigned D, typename N>
00252             std::ostream &operator << (std::ostream &o, const Vector<D, N> &v) {
00253         //  i might want to use other brackets one day
00254         o << "<";
00255         for ( unsigned i = 0; i < v.dimension ()-1; i++ )
00256         o << v[i] << ",";
00257         o << v[v.dimension ()-1] << ">";
00258         return o;
00259     }

00280             Vector<D> cross (const Vector<D> &, const Vector<D> &, const Vector<D> &);

00287     template <typename N>
00288             Vector<3, N> vcross (Vector<3, N> a, Vector<3, N> b) {
00289         static Vector<3, N> c;
00290 
00291         c[0] = a[1]*b[2]-a[2]*b[1];
00292         c[1] = a[2]*b[0]-a[0]*b[2];
00293         c[2] = a[0]*b[1]-a[1]*b[0];
00294 
00295         return c;
00296     }
00297 
00299 
00304     template <typename N>
00305             Vector<4, N> vcross (Vector<4, N> a, Vector<4, N> b, Vector<4, N> c) {
00306         static Vector<4, N> d;
00307         N A = b[0]*c[1]-b[1]*c[0],
00308         B = b[0]*c[2]-b[2]*c[0],
00309         C = b[0]*c[3]-b[3]*c[0],
00310         D = b[1]*c[2]-b[2]*c[1],
00311         E = b[1]*c[3]-b[3]*c[1],
00312         F = b[2]*c[3]-b[3]*c[2];
00313 
00314         d[0] =  a[1]*F - a[2]*E + a[3]*D;
00315         d[1] = -a[0]*F + a[2]*C - a[3]*B;
00316         d[2] =  a[0]*E - a[1]*C + a[3]*A;
00317         d[3] = -a[0]*D + a[1]*B - a[2]*A;
00318 
00319         return d;
00320     }
00321 
00323 
00326     template <unsigned D, typename N>
00327             Vector<D, N> vnormalize( const Vector<D, N> &x ) {
00328         static Vector<D, N> n;
00329         N norm = sqrt ( x.sqnorm() );
00330         for ( unsigned i = 0; i < D; i++ ) n[i] = x[i]/norm;
00331         return n;
00332     }
00333 }
